strats.name: Brinstar Reserve Hole-in-One
note: A single very precise jump into the bomb blocks can break both sets of blocks with screw attack. Obtaining the item requires morph, so this strat has no soft lock risk.
Alternatively, tunnel crawl through to break both blocks with multiple, less precise jumps.

strats.name: Brinstar Reserve Temporary Blue
note: Speedball through the morphtunnel and use it to break the bomb blocks in front of the hidden Missile location.
This can be done using springball, or by unmorphing and using Temporary Blue to bounce through the bomb blocks.

nodes.name: Early Supers Left Door (to Green Shaft)
Early Supers Right Door (to Brinstar Reserve)
Missile (green Brinstar below super missile)
Super Missile (green Brinstar top)
Early Supers Junction (Sidehopper Pit)

strats.name: Early Supers Mockball

failures.name: Crumble Fall
failures.note: Falls down into node 3 with no possiblity of quick crumble escape.

strats.note: Mockball to roll over the crumble blocks without falling down, and under the gate before it closes.

strats.name: Early Supers Crouch Gate Clip Jump

failures.name: Crumble Fall
failures.note: Falls down into node 3 with no possiblity of quick crumble escape.

note: Run then do a very small spin jump to clip into the left side of the first gate.
While inside the gate, back up to get the maximum run distance using either Moonwalk or X-Ray Turnaround and repeat for the next gate.
It is also possible to clip into the gates by aiming down while in the spin jump.
A down-back is also possible for clipping into the first gate, but it is generally harder.

strats.name: Early Supers Crouch Gate Clip Damage Boost

failures.name: Crumble Fall
failures.note: Falls down into node 3 with no possiblity of quick crumble escape.

note: Spawn a Zeb then run and do a very small spin jump to clip into the first gate before the Zeb reaches you.
Do a damage boost off of the Zeb while inside the first gate to get enough speed to clip into the next gate.
It is also possible to clip into the gates by aiming down while in the spin jump.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: This has no requirements, but getting back out does!

strats.name: Mockball
strats.note: Not considered a notable strat because executing this has no real value.

strats.name: Early Supers Quick Crumble Escape (Dual Quick Crumble)

failures.name: Crumble Failure
failures.note: Failure leaves you in node 3 with solid crumble blocks above your head.

strats.note: This one involves doing a second quick crumble escape on the way out as a means to avoid doing a crumble jump.

strats.name: Early Supers Quick Crumble Escape (Space)

failures.name: Crumble Failure
failures.note: Failure leaves you in node 3 with solid crumble blocks above your head.

strats.note: Space Jump is here as an alternative to performing a crumble jump on the way out.

failures.name: Crumble Failure

nodes.name: Etecoon E-Tank Top Left Door (to Etecoon Supers)
Etecoon E-Tank Top Right Door (to Beetoms)
Etecoon E-Tank Bottom Left Door (to Save)
Etecoon E-Tank Bottom Right Door (to Etecoons)
Energy Tank, Etecoons
Etecoon E-Tank Junction (Right of Tunnel)
nodes.note: This is to the right of the thorny morph tunnel.

nodes.name: Etecoon E-Tank Zebbo Farm Junction
note: This includes the three Zebbo farms, but not the rightmost or leftmost Beetom.
The Beetom kills or tanking their damage is taken care of by getting to this node.
To use the farm points, a Beetom near the Zebbo spawner must have been removed as an obstacle in some way.

strats.name: Etecoon E-Tank Beetom Clip
note: Jump and freeze the Beetom at a precise location in order to jump through the crumble blocks.
The pixel window is larger and higher with Morph and an X-Ray Stand Up.
Two Beetom hits are assumed, but with failed attempts it could take more, possibly requiring leaving the Beetom and going back to the right to farm.
strats.devNote: Morph is required to lure a Beetom. Morphless tunnel crawl should not be required.

strats.name: Etecoon E-Tank X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 1 screen.
strats.devNote: In truth this goes to node 1, but there's no need to make a link for this since movement between 1 and 2 is free (via 5).

strats.name: Etecoon Spikeway Tunnel Crawl (Left to Right)
note: Moving left to right is a bit more tricky to get into the tunnel.
Land aiming down approximately 3 pixels inside the leftmost tile.
If Samus is too far left she will fall out, too far right and a thorn pushes her out, not aiming down puts her stuck in crouch.
Then spinjump right to take a thorn hit and get wedged in the ceiling.
Then start the crawl while taking constant thorn damage. Perform one jump per thorn hit.
Note that if Samus is hit by the thorn before landing, aiming down is not necessary.
Note that a moonfall may be helpful to get into the tunnel.
Without moonwalk, a downback can be used instead: fall off with low speed and start a downback right away. (This doesn't always work.)

strats.name: Etecoon Spikeway Aim Cancel Wiggle
strats.note: Wiggle through the thorns. It is a long wiggle with a lot of thorn hits.

strats.name: Etecoon Spikeway Xray Wiggle (Left to Right)
note: Maintain IFrames by using X-Ray whenever a thorn would deal damage.
Move by alternating between X-Ray turnarounds and normal turnarounds.
Simply crouch again following any accidental X-Ray Standups.

strats.name: Zeb and Beetom Farm
devNote: FIXME: Node 3 could be used to reset the room, with additional requirements.

strats.name: Kill the Beetoms
strats.note: Killing one Beetom is all that is needed to get to the farm.

strats.name: Bomb the Beetoms
note: You typically need to place two bombs to kill them. Place the second shortly after the first and it will kill the Beetom on your way down.
Killing one Beetom is all that is needed to get to the farm.

strats.name: Freeze the Beetoms
strats.devNote: Although this won't kill the Beetoms, it will remove them as an obstacle.

strats.name: Tank the Damage
strats.note: The damage included here is to get all the way to the left door.

strats.name: Etecoon Beetom Tricky Dodge (Right to Left)
strats.devNote: Although this won't kill the Beetoms, it will remove them as an obstacle.
note: When entering the room, it is recommended to open the door to be used as a quick escape if a Beetom attaches to Samus.
Wait for the first Beetom to get stuck under one of the platforms. It may be necessary to lure it to the right.
At this point, the farm can be used to gain energy.
Jump into the thorns to get invulnerability frames, then run through, luring the Beetoms under the platforms while clearing and using the farms.
Note that it is possible to shake a Beetom off of Samus by rapidly turning left and right, or angling up and down, etc. Samus will take 2-4 hits.

strats.name: Etecoon Spikeway Tunnel Crawl (Right to Left)
note: Moving right to left is a bit easier to get into the tunnel.
Land aiming down approximately 3 pixels inside the rightmost tile.
If Samus is too far right she will fall out, too far left and a thorn pushes her out, not aiming down puts her stuck in crouch.
Then spinjump left to take a thorn hit and get wedged in the ceiling.
Then start the crawl while taking constant thorn damage. Perform one jump per thorn hit.
Note that if Samus is hit by the thorn before landing, aiming down is not necessary.
Note that a downback may be helpful to get into the tunnel: stand fully on the left side of the nearby ledge and run off then start and hold a downback to land in position.
strats.devNote: This is not feasible to do with beetoms on Samus. Fortunately avoiding the Beetoms also requires canTrickyJump.

strats.name: Etecoon Spikeway Xray Wiggle (Right to Left)
note: Maintain IFrames by using X-Ray whenever a thorn would deal damage.
Move by alternating between X-Ray turnarounds and normal turnarounds.
Simply crouch again following any accidental X-Ray Standups.

strats.name: Back to the Farm
strats.note: Killing one Beetom is all that is needed to get to the farm.

strats.name: Kill the Beetoms
strats.note: Killing one Beetom is all that is needed to get to the farm.

strats.name: Bomb the Beetoms
note: You typically need to place two bombs to kill them. Place the second shortly after the first and it will kill the Beetom on your way down.
Killing one Beetom is all that is needed to get to the farm.

strats.name: Freeze the Beetoms
strats.devNote: Although this won't kill the Beetoms, it will remove them as an obstacle.

strats.name: Tank the Damage
strats.note: The damage included here is to get all the way to the right door.

strats.name: Etecoon Beetom Tricky Dodge (Left to Right)
strats.devNote: Although this won't kill the Beetoms, it will remove them as an obstacle.
note: Wait for the first Beetom to get stuck under the first platform, then get to the first farm.
If the second Beetom is making this farm difficult to use, it may be easier to use the next farm.
Jump into the thorns to get invulnerability frames, then run through, luring the Beetoms under the platforms while clearing and using the farms.
Note that it is possible to shake a Beetom off of Samus by rapidly turning left and right, or angling up and down, etc. Samus will take 2-4 hits.

strats.name: Beetom Farm
strats.note: Kill the Beetoms with Screw Attack or by freezing them and using Bombs or Power Bombs.
devNote: Using an adjacent 2-tile runway doesn't seem workable since heat frames may be too much to maintain energy.
We can't use Missiles for the farm since the Beetoms don't drop Missiles.
Potentially there could be some other way to dodge the Beetoms, to kill them without Ice or Screw

FIXME: Using a Missile, Super, or Power Bomb at the start could be added to the logic to get the first Power Bombs to use for further farming, but this needs a way to express that we're not in health-bomb energy range.

strats.name: Kill the Beetoms
strats.devNote: They are also possible to jump over with a small runway in the previous room.

strats.name: Bomb the Beetoms
note: You typically need to place two bombs to kill them. Place the second shortly after the first and it will kill the Beetom on your way down.
The remaining Beetoms can be safely killed from the ledge.

strats.name: Jump Through the Room
strats.note: Jump on the first possible frame.  Can be buffered to extend the window to 7 frames.  Or jump just before the transition.

strats.name: Bomb the Beetoms
note: You typically need to place two bombs to kill them. Place the second shortly after the first and it will kill the Beetom on your way down.
The remaining Beetoms can be safely killed from the ledge.

strats.name: Jump Through the Room
strats.note: Jump on the first possible frame.  Can be buffered to extend the window to 7 frames.  Or jump just before the transition.

strats.name: Green Brinstar Main Shaft Right-Side X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 1 screen.

strats.name: Green Brinstar Main Shaft Left-Side X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 4 screens.

strats.name: Shinespark
note: This is specifically a shinespark that doesn't reach the top.
Needs HJB to bonk at the right place without walljumping.

strats.name: Green Brinstar Shaft Zeela Stuck Moonfall
note: Freeze two Zeelas to perform an 'Enemy Stuck Moonfall' in order to clip through the Power Bomb blocks.
Position one Zeela upside down on a ceiling, and another below it on the ground.
Freezing them together is the hardest part.
Freezing one then unequipping Ice Beam to dispel the ice effect works well to synchronize them.
They must be frozen for the full duration of the moonfall to automatically clip through the floor, but sliding off early can also work.
From directly on top of the Power Bomb blocks, no pose change is needed, but a Super Missile can speed up the Zeela setup greatly.

strats.name: Green Brinstar Main Shaft Ice Clip
note: Freeze the wall crawler at a precise location in order to jump through the Power Bomb Blocks.
The pixel window is larger and higher with Morph and an X-Ray Stand Up.

strats.name: Full Etecoon Walljump Climb
strats.note: Not quite the full climb, but close enough.

strats.name: Full Etecoon IBJ
strats.note: This is the full climb, since you have to drop down to 10 and start there.

strats.name: Mockball
strats.note: The Mockball is setup at 11.
